rows.label: qst201416_msg0001
rows.name:
It's fine to talk all night,
but don't cause trouble for
other people, okay?

rows.label: qst201416_msg0002
rows.name:
Otherwise, you'll just get
everyone angry at you again.

rows.label: qst201416_msg0003
rows.name:
It's fine to talk all night, but
stop dragging other people into
your noise. Especially me...

rows.label: qst201416_msg0004
rows.name:
Well, you got scolded by everyone,
so I'm sure you understand now.

rows.label: qst201416_msg0005
rows.name:
To think you'd talk until morning...
Did my lecture have no effect?

rows.label: qst201416_msg0006
rows.name:
But that dance this morning
should have taught you a
lesson, so I'll say no more.

rows.label: qst201416_msg0007
rows.name:
Talkin' all night is fine,
but ye can't be causin'
trouble for others, alright?

rows.label: qst201416_msg0008
rows.name:
Ye don't want another long
lecture from Meleph, do ye?

rows.label: qst201416_msg0011
rows.name:
It was really fun to get
excited about all sorts
of things with someone!

rows.label: qst201416_msg0012
rows.name:
Next time, I want to have a
long chat with just you, Rex!

rows.label: qst201416_msg0013
rows.name:
Next time, I want to have a
long chat with just you, Nia!

rows.label: qst201416_msg0014
rows.name:
Next time, I want to have a
long chat with just you, Zeke!

rows.label: qst201416_msg0015
rows.name:
Next time, I want to have a long
chat with just you, Meleph!

rows.label: qst201416_msg0016
rows.name:
Well, if it's just the two
of us... sure. Your stories
are interesting, Zakuro.

rows.label: qst201416_msg0017
rows.name:
Meleph would probably lecture
us if she found out... but I
guess it's fine once in a while.

rows.label: qst201416_msg0018
rows.name:
Sure. If ye're fine with me, I'll
join ye for a chat, Zakuro.

rows.label: qst201416_msg0019
rows.name:
You haven't learned at all... But I
must admire your spirit, Zakuro.
